name: cypress-sms
description: usability testing for school management system

scripts.login: npx cypress run --env allure=true --spec cypress/e2e/login.cy.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.subject: npx cypress run --env allure=true --spec cypress/e2e/add_subject.cy.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.grade: npx cypress run --env allure=true --spec cypress/e2e/add_grade.cy.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.student1: npx cypress run --env allure=true --spec cypress/e2e/add_student1.cy.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.student2: npx cypress run --env allure=true --spec cypress/e2e/add_student2.cy.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.profile: npx cypress run --env allure=true --spec cypress/e2e/edit_profile.cy.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:all: npm run login && npm run subject && npm run grade && npm run student1 && npm run student2 && npm run profile

author: ThreeLittleCar
